name: A Life Well Lived
description:
Mini jam #85 (theme: GOLD, limitation: One-Minute Timer)

Gold is usually something that is very precious. The most precious thing to people they say is memories. In this game your goal will be to collect as meny precious memories as possible. 

But keep in mind that each try ends when you reach old age. When it happens may vary, but if you don't do anything it's 1 min from the start. Each second you are getting one year older. Don't waste time, get some education, form a family, do something productive with your time! I'n not saying that some activities may prolong your existence, but I'm not not saying it.

Try to collect as many memories as possible! Let it be a life well lived. A life full of gold memories.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD or arrows
  • Action: E
  • Jump: Space
  • Run: Left Shift
  • Show menu: Escape
